CC1.flavor: Urza's forces tore across Argoth, and Argoth responded in kind.
CC1.name: Bane of Progress
CC1.text: When Bane of Progress enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. Put a +1/+1 counter on Bane of Progress for each permanent destroyed this way.

CC1.flavor:
"Absolute power is the only true authority. Anything less is a lie told by the weak."
—Garruk Wildspeaker
CC1.name: Command Tower
CC1.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

CC1.name: Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury
CC1.text:
+2: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token with "{T}: Add {G}."
−2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
−6: Draw a card for each green creature you control.
Freyalise, Llanowar's Fury can be your commander.

CC1.flavor: From the Roil emerged a ravenous primordial being of pure mana.

CC1.text:
You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end.
Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each unspent green mana you have.

CC1.flavor:
"The land echoes our intentions, and the kami echo the land. We must strive to live in harmony with the world even when it seems to rise against us."
—Diary of Azusa
CC1.name: Seedborn Muse
CC1.text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

CC1.flavor: Deep within the heart of the forest, a new sun flared to life.
CC1.name: Sol Ring
Sylvan Library
CC1.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

CC1.flavor:
"A single chord brings them to heel. A whole song, and they dance."
—Yisan, the wanderer bard

Flash
You control your opponents while they're searching their libraries.
While an opponent is searching their library, they exile each card they find. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

CMR.name: Opposition Agent
CMR.text:
Flash
You control your opponents while they're searching their libraries.
While an opponent is searching their library, they exile each card they find. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

CMR.flavor:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One
CMR.name: Phyrexian Rager
CMR.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

CMR.name: Phyrexian Triniform
CMR.text:
When Phyrexian Triniform dies, create three 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.
Encore {12} ({12}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

CMR.name: Port Razer
CMR.text:
Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Port Razer can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

CMR.name: Port Razer
CMR.text:
Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.

CMR.flavor:
"Those that fall short of perfection can still contribute to the Great Work."
—Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor
CMR.name: Profane Transfusion
CMR.text: Two target players exchange life totals. You create an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token, where X is the difference between those players' life totals.

CMR.flavor: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."
CMR.name: Prophetic Prism
CMR.text:
When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

CMR.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
CMR.text:
When you cast this spell, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh.
Flying
Sacrifice another creature: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

CMR.flavor: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."
